findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of tokens
findings.description: The owner can mint tokens after initial deployment without any restrictions.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized contract ownership transfer
findings.description: The owner has the ability to transfer and renounce contract ownership.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized change in SKY token generation/mint per second
findings.description: The owner can change SKY token generation/mint per second via the '_changeEmissions' function.

findings.title: Token Contract does not have fees/taxes
findings.description: The token contract lacks a mechanism to charge fees or taxes on transactions.

findings.title: Max transaction amount cannot be changed
findings.description: The maximum transaction amount is hardcoded and cannot be modified after deployment.

findings.title: Owner cannot pause the trading
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the ability to pause trading.

findings.title: Owner cannot block users
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the capability to block users.
